commits.message:
EUCA-11025 - Request log records full contents for POST requests (SOAP messages, etc)

Cherry Pick of 0ce95e5 from 4.1.2 into master.

Description:
 Change the cloud-requests.log to not log POST content at all log levels other
 than TRACE.

Changes:
 - Changed logging of POST content to output '--REDACTED--' in the logs if
   logging at any level other than TRACE and the parsed content has any data.
 - Didn't change logging for POST data that has been filtered to an empty
   string, as it wastes space to fill in '--REDACTED--' for an emptry string.

Testing:
 - Tested fix with and without TRACE level to verify that it no longer logged
   the post data atINFO/DEBUG levels.
